creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
Wyona comes with its own xinclude processor. Cocoon already ships with two.
Avoid this duplication by either
1. bringing (wyona) xinclude into shape and donating it to Cocoon
2. migrate the features to Cocoon xinclude, donate them and drop wyona xinlude

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: this is part of the XPS legacy that is going away
